name: The Adventure Of a Sorvu
description:
The Adventure Of a Sorvu is a RPG game that is in a DEMO version.

In these adventure you will learn some lore for the complete game.

These is my first game, I intend for this game to be liked by those who play it.

Please, report any bug on the game.

The game comes in the "TAOS" folder, and the file you have to use is the application named "Game".
